sen.j: 西大路御池駅（にしおおじおいけえき）は、京都府京都市中京区にある、京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄東西線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in the Nakagyo Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, the Nishioji-oike Station is a stop on the Tozai Line, the Kyoto City Subway.
Located in the Nakagyo ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Nishioji-oike Station is a stop on the Tozai Line, the Kyoto City Subway.
Nishioji-oike Station, located in the Nakagyo ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Tozai Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway.
sen.cmt: Kyoto Municipal Subwayで統一しています。

sen.j: 2008年1月16日に開業。
sen.e: The station opened on January 16, 2008.
The station opened on January 16, 2008.
The station opened on January 16, 2008.

sen.j: 西大路御池交差点下に設置される。
sen.e: The station lies under the Nishioji-oike crossing.
The station lies under the Nishioji-oike crossing.
The station lies under the Nishioji-oike crossing.

sen.j: 駅ナンバリングはT16。
sen.e: The number given to the station is T16.
The number given to the station is T16.
The number given to the station is T16.

sen.j: ステーションカラーはひまわり色。
sen.e: A color given to the station is sunflower color.
A sunflower tone is the color given to the station.
A sunflower tone is the color given to the station.

sen.j: 京都市内の鉄道は、駅名として、東西方向に走る路線は「交叉する南北の街路名」を名付け、南北方向に走る路線（地下鉄烏丸線）は「交叉する東西方向の街路名」を付ける。
sen.e: Station names of the subways in Kyoto City are given as follows: give 'a name of a street running north-south' to a station on the line running east-west which crosses the street or give 'a name of a street running east-west' to a station on the line running north-south (Karasuma Line) which crosses the street.

The station names on the subways in Kyoto City are given in the following manner: give 'a name of a street running north-south' to a station on the line running east-west that crosses the street, or give 'a name of a street running east-west' to a station on the line running north-south (Karasuma Line) that crosses the street.

The station names on the subways in Kyoto City are given in the following manner: give 'a name of a street running north-south' to a station on the line running east-west that crosses the street, or give 'a name of a street running east-west' to a station on the line running north-south (Karasuma Line) that crosses the street.

sen.j: 仮称駅名は「西大路駅」だったが、JR京都線の西大路駅と紛らわしいことから、駅名を決定するにあたり、烏丸御池駅と同様に真上に位置する交差点名が仮称駅名の後に付けられた。
sen.e: The station was temporarily given the name 'Nishioji Station' but it was confusing with the Nishioji Station on the JR Kyoto Line, and therefore it was decided to add 'oike' to 'Nishioji' to have the same name as the crossing located just above the station, like the Karasuma-oike Station.

The station was temporarily given the name 'Nishioji Station' but it was too easily confused with Nishioji Station on the JR Kyoto Line, so it was decided to add 'oike' to 'Nishioji' in order to have the same name as the crossing located just above the station, like Karasuma-oike Station.

The station was temporarily given the name 'Nishioji Station' but it was too easily confused with Nishioji Station on the JR Kyoto Line, so it was decided to add 'oike' to 'Nishioji' in order to have the same name as the crossing located just above the station, like Karasuma-oike Station.

sen.j: なお、2007年2月に行われた駅名の公募では「西大路」が41%を占め、「西大路御池」は16%だった。
sen.e: Incidentally, among the public opinions for a station name gathered in February 2007, 'Nishioji' counted for 41% and 'Nishioji-oike' 16%.
Incidentally, among the public opinions for a station name gathered in February 2007, 'Nishioji' counted for 41% and 'Nishioji-oike' 16%.
Incidentally, among the public opinions for a station name gathered in February 2007, 'Nishioji' counted for 41% and 'Nishioji-oike' 16%.

sen.j: ホームは島式1面2線で、ホームドアが設置される。
sen.e: An island platform serving two tracks with platform doors.
An island platform serves two tracks with platform doors.
An island platform serves two tracks with platform doors.

sen.j: 改札口は1ヶ所のみ。
sen.e: Only one ticket gate is installed.
Only one ticket gate is installed.
Only one ticket gate is installed.

sen.j: 改札外にはバスロケーションシステムがあり、京都市営バスの現在地が分かるようになっている。
sen.e: A bus location system is installed outside the ticket gate to provide real-time locations of the Kyoto City buses.
A bus locator system is installed outside the ticket gate to provide real-time information on the locations of Kyoto City buses.
A bus locator system is installed outside the ticket gate to provide real-time information on the locations of Kyoto City buses.
